publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4716 Euan Robson: Local Government Boundaries in Kelso and Districtâ€”That the Parliament, whilst recognising the work of the Local Government Boundary Commission for Scotland in its report E06026 of July 2006, Fourth Statutory Review of Electoral Arrangements - Scottish Borders Council Area, believes that the communities of Heiton and Roxburgh should be included in the Kelso and District electoral ward because of their historic, cultural, educational, social, economic and health service ties with that town. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4716 Local Government Boundaries in Kelso and District (lodged on 16 August 2006) Mike Pringle*
